page.title: 11SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES (0-15)
page.content: Children of ages 0-5 tend to go round a friends house or watch T.V. Schools do not tend to provide clubs or activities for children this age.Most children would like to see a swimming pool in Raunds.Overall children do like living in Raunds. Children of age 6-10 also tend to go to a friends house or watch T.V. Schools do provide clubs for children of this age.The children whom we interviewed would also like to see a swimming pool in Raunds.Children of this age also like living in Raunds. Children of age 11-15 tend to play around in the streets or go to a park.Schools do provide clubs for children this age.Children would like to see a cinema or a swimming pool in Raunds.Children this age do not generally like living in Raunds.
